foundational.title: Foundational
foundational.description: Build core coding habits and web basics.
foundational.focusArea: Programming basics, web fundamentals, version control
learningObjectives: Learn core programming constructs and problem solving.
Understand HTML/CSS/JS and web development basics.
Use Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration.

core.title: Core
core.description: Master essential technologies used across roles.
core.focusArea: Essential technologies (.NET, React, Database, Backend frameworks)
learningObjectives: Build full-stack apps using React and backend APIs.
Model and query data with relational and NoSQL databases.
Develop production-grade services with .NET or Node frameworks.

specialized.title: Specialized
specialized.description: Go deep on advanced frameworks and delivery.
learningObjectives: Ship features with Next.js and modern routing.
Design robust APIs using GraphQL or REST best practices.
Automate CI/CD and containerize with Docker basics.

quality.title: Quality
learningObjectives: Write unit, integration, and E2E tests confidently.
Profile and optimize performance for real-world workloads.
Apply security best practices to protect users and data.
